alert.note: Alert for Larue (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 7:05PM EDT until August 10 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT/1015 PM EDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Extreme southern Hardin, southern LaRue, Hart, eastern Grayson, and northern Edmonson counties. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT /1015 PM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 602 PM CDT /702 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hodgenville, Munfordville, Upton, Sonora, Bonnieville, Priceville, Macon, Riders Mill, Wheelers Mill, and Lines Mill. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
